about.title: About me
description: I have been enthusiastic about web development since the day i got my first computer. That has lead me to pursue a career in web development as a .net backend developer. Currently, I am focusing on frontend development and it has very exciting taking advantage of the power of react library to build interesting frontend projects.
My intention is to showcase all my frontend projects in this website. Be sure to revisit to see more interesting projects
